about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Prop Haunt is a multiplayer horror game where you play as either an investigator reporting haunts or spirit that is trying to grow their influence and scare other players. Choose either preventing spirits from taking hold or embrace the horror and try to increase your influence to be the strongest spirit.

PLAY AS A SPIRIT

• Interactive Environment: Travel through the ritual sites to modify the objects in the world and build up your power.

• Unique Spirits: Choose between multiple types of spirits that fit how you want to be seen.

• Spells: Weaken other spirits by choosing between a selection of spells to target them with.

• Scare your friends: Use your power to cause havoc on the investigator, setting up scares to make them jump!

PLAY AS AN INVESTIGATOR

• Scary Environment: Not only do you have to worry about anomalies at the ritual site but also defend against the spirits targeting you directly in your safe house.

• Upgrade your hideout: Improve your hideout and your technology as you grow in skills as an investigator, proving the existence of the spirits.

• Traps: Place traps for the spirits to interrupt their haunting.

• Resist the spirits: Use your investigative skills to report anomalies before the spirits increase influence by too much.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: Prop Haunt is a 4v1 multiplayer psychological horror game. Take on the role of spirits focused on expanding their influence on the physical world by haunting objects or play as an investigator assigned to report on these hauntings to reduce the amount of paranormal activity in the world.
